author: CHUMP mhunter
comment: Fun watch face. The weather is not showing on my face even though I have it checked to show in the settings. I have Galaxy S5 and a GWR. Any reason why this would happen? Maybe could you add a setting to refresh weather in the face settings?

reply.author: Acorns Studio
reply.content: Thanks for your suggestion! We will fix this bug asap

reply.author: Acorns Studio
